name: Cherry on Top!
description:
Cherry on Top! 

Cherry on Top is a game all about putting the cherry on the cake! You are the cherry and your goal is to fling yourself on top of the cake to make him happy. You can platform through levels using sticky frosting and bouncy marshmallows to assist you. Just be careful for that hot syrup lava!

I hope you enjoy! 

(if it says it has been updated after the deadline I decided to make things easier and make it playable in the browser)

(music and some sfx were found on royalty free website, found black circle material on unity hub)
